## PRECIPITATION

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
pr <- read.csv('../data/validation/pr.csv')
pr_long <- pr |> pivot_longer(!time, names_to = "model", values_to = "value")
```


```{r}
ggplot(pr_long) +
  geom_histogram(aes(x=value,color=model))
```
